reviews.review: What a lovely little masterpiece this is.
Everyone needs to play this game!
I like this game.I would try the co-op, but have no friends with the game. Rip lmao
help my  master dong is currently at the other side of the chamber!

What a fun game, this game is one worth playing and worth buying. The winter and christmas sale especially goes for really cheap, it's such a good price for what the game contains. I really love how much content is in Portal 2. Recommend buying and playing portal 1 and portal 2, but start on portal 1 (it's super short compared to portal 2) and gives you a jist as well to what the story is before you play portal 2. Overally though, Portal 2 is great fun to play. Many puzzles although some try and be sneaky and sneak stuff in at last minute. But, it's a great fun to play. Recommend to play!
its a brilliant puzzle game with a well thought out story
Amazing sequel to the original Portal game, if you haven't played it yet... DO IT ALREADY IT'S GREAT!!!
Obra prima em forma de jogo v2.
good luck finding where to go
Juegazo, graficos decentes, puzzles magnificos y risas aseguradas con compañeros. Horas de diversión y rejugabilidad interesante. El workshop ayuda.
Pretty fun game. Really takes the plot of the original portal and pushes in a good direction. One of the few sequels that I can say can even be better than the original.
прикольно что хорошие головоломки есть моды и карты из мастерской
Even though I only played the game this year and I'm relatively new to gaming I would 100% recommend this to anyone, it is amazing.
剧情非常棒，比起一部的全程解密，二部剧情占了大头，而且剧情都非常棒，很有代入感，场景都做的非常大，非常真实。赞赞赞赞赞赞。
игра просто идеальная сюжет 10 из 10 рекомендую всем.
Portal 2 is one of the best Puzzle games of the last century. The story never gets old and the humor is very good.

Gameplay - 10/10
The puzzles are fun and can get quite challenging at times, which only makes them more fun. They are always new, apart from the first few that are the same to the first few Portal 1 levels, but that is on purpose and the levels have had quite a big visual change.

Story - 10/10
The story is very good and the characters are funny (specifically Wheatley, who is voiced by Stephen Merchant). The story has a nice twist in the middle and some comedic humour added in at the correct times. The levels and puzzles are twisted nicely into the story and actually have relevance. 

Co-op - 7/10
The co-op experience is good and its the only game that me and my friend like consistently playing (at the time of writing).

Performance - 10/10
I could probably run this on a Microsoft Surface Tablet thing as my friend ran it on his 'craptop' as a consistent 20-30fps on low settings. But, I dunno what i expected tbh as its from 2011.

Graphics - 8/10
Not quite on par with games like Horizon Zero Dawn or Red Dead Redemption 2... obviously, bcoz its from 2011. But if Valve Release Portal 3 with these graphics today, i would be happy.

Overall, I recommend this game to anyone who hasn't played it yet.
Probably the best puzzle game i've played. Not only is the story great, the multiplayer is also extremly fun to play with friends.
Um otimo game para quem gosta de pensar um pouquinho em vez de esfregar as teclas

Portal 2 continues and enriches deeply the story of Portal, especially the ending is amazing. In addition, the co-operative mode is extremely challenging and very fun to play with friends. I would highly recommended it even if the game had only the co-op mode.
Поржал так что стал туберкулезником ЗАЕБИСЬ👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
Yes good old game but good game only if portal 1 already but get now good fun experience for playing. SCI - FI Also get Rocket League
hell yes you should play this game. The puzzles are 10x harder this go around but it is so satisfying when you figure them out. Play it.

Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei, muito engraçado (tem que entender a legenda ou a voz em inglês), muito bem feito, é tudo incrível, está na lista de jogos que você tem que jogar na sua vida, mas antes joga o Portal 1.
Every gamer should have to play at least the story. One of the best games ever to be published.
This game is just pure fun. Single player is more than enough fun but coop makes that 200 percent. Just a great game in all aspects. Wish they'd make a third.
Witty dialogue, incredibly fun story, and mentally intensive in a great way

Its a lot like Skyrim, like A LOT. Still good and very original. Think Skyrim but with portals.
Best product Valve has ever put out. 10/10 i grew up playing this game over and over again so my review is pretty biased.
en solitario se vuelve medio aburrido, pero con un amigo o amiga se vuelve gracioso, sin duda un juegazo que vale la pena comprar
Por mas que intento, no logro chocar con mi reflejo del portal :(

Le début de portal2 nous remet directement dans le bain et la hype est directement là, quand on a aimé le premier opus et qu'il nous a marqué c'est un sentiment de satisfaction incroyable qu'on ressent quand on commence celui ci
Une masterclass du début à la fin, encore meilleur que le premier, et qui pousse l'histoire encore plus loin, qui confirme des choses et qui nous chamboule/nous marque tout autant et même encore plus que le précédent

Les graphismes font du coup un petit level up qui fait plaisir et qui permet de kiffer encore plus

On a aussi bien évidemment de nouvelles mécaniques très intelligemment pensées qui font leur apparition, ce qui renouvelle aussi le jeu
Et la coop! juste trop trop bien, c'est tellement cool de pouvoir jouer avec quelqu'un, de se creuser la tête ensemble! par contre jouez-y quand vous êtes en forme(pas a 3-4h du mat comme moi), parce que vraiment sur les dernières salles, j'ai pas trouvé une seule réponse, et aussi évitez d'y jouer avec quelqu'un de trop intelligent sinon vous vous sentirez mal et vous aurez même pas le temps de réflechir ahaha

Je me suis sentie vide à la fin, vous savez ce sentiment qu'on ressent quand on a fini un anime, un film ou une série qui nous a vraiment marqué et qui est juste incroyable? c'est ça
Ce jeu est juste magnifiquement incroyable, je suis contente d'être tombée dessus, mieux vaut tard que jamais! n'hésitez pas une seule seconde

Portal, en mieux ! Plus de diversité dans les niveaux et les environnements, encore plus d'humour et le gameplay est meilleur encore.Je vous recommande vraiment les deux jeux, qui même aujourd'hui restent géniaux =)
this is my favorite game! i’m a huge fan of physics games, puzzle games, and games with a good plot. this game has all of that, on top of some really gorgeous assets!
10/10 Muhteşem bir oyun, mizahı, oynanışı, bulmacaları çok keyifli.
Это просто класс, достойный уровень для цифровых головоломок.Рекомендую !!!!!!!!!

ЭТА ИГРА БОЖЕСТВЕННА. Проходил её очень давно на пиратке, зашла. Спустя время приобрел лицензию, и О БОЖЕЧКИ КОШЕЧКИ. Игра проходится на одном дыхании, просто офигеннно. После сюжетки, можно пойти с другом или друзьями в кооп. В коопе всегда можно повеселиться, да и размять свои мозги после долгого перерыва в логике. 10 порталов из 10.
its good. but some levels can be hard and take some time to solve. a time killer game it is.
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAa estoy desesperado no me lo termine, quede en el capitulo 7 creo y no me abre la partida
